title: Read Optics 1.0 Reading Sunglasses for Men, Half Frame Metal Ready to Wear Black Tinted Sun Readers, Spring Hinges for Comfortable Fit. UV and Sun Protection
features: MENS QUALITY READING SUNGLASSES. These stylish half frame sun readers are designed with spring hinges and rubber nose pads so they will adjust comfortably to fit most face shapes. With our tinted glasses you can read and enjoy the sun but you do not have to switch between your sunglasses and reading glasses. Reading sunglasses are really convenient and perfect for home or travel.
CLASSIC MENS DESIGN. The semi-rimless design is great if you want a pair of reading sunglasses but not full rimmed. The front of the frame and arms are in black metal. The arms have a subtle pattern.
ALL LENS MAGNIFICATION AVAILABLE. Lens strength + 1.0 1.5 2.0 2.5 3.0 3.5. Optical smoke tinted quality lenses that are anti-reflective and anti-glare. Scratch, smudge resistant & easy to clean.
LIGHTWEIGHT AND STRONG HALF FRAME GLASSES. These rectangular glasses combine the look of a rimless frame, but have the strength and durability of full frame specs.
MEASUREMENTS. Lens width 53mm, bridge width 18mm, arm length 138mm. Weight 23.1g. Conform to BS EN 14139:2010 & EN 14139:2010
description: Read Optics - Designing & Manufactuing Ready to Wear Eyewear: We provide quality, ready to wear reading glasses at affordable prices, offering a wide range of non prescription eyewear. This includes our premium quality half frame metal sun reading glasses, ready to wear smoke tinted glasses so you can read safely in the sun whilst protecting your eyes. These sun readers for men have spring hinges and rubber nose pads for a comfortable adjustable fit. All our reading glasses come in multiple lens strengths and are designed to be lightweight and comfortable. Our clear images provide a close up and clear view of the design of the frame and measurements.
